name: WSColourScheme
summary: Easy to use beautiful colour schemes and colour manipulation.
description: WSColourScheme is an easy to use class that contains beautiful predefined colour schemes as well as the ability to set your own custom colour scheme. It also features colour manipulation tools including, Colour Lighter/Darker Control, Colour Saturation, Colour Desaturation, Colour Greyscale, Colour Complement, and Colour Invert.
